description.oldValue:
Microsoft Graph Connectors that allow to index third-party content into Microsoft Graph to enable intelligent experiences like Microsoft Search will be available in Government Community Cloud (GCC). GCC-H and DoD launch is coming soon.
GA date: September CY2022
description.newValue: Microsoft Graph Connectors that allow to index third-party content into Microsoft Graph to enable intelligent experiences like Microsoft Search will be available in Government Community Cloud (GCC). GCC-H and DoD launch is coming soon.
